#Text=Twelve dead at Brazilian school after man opens fire
#Text=Thursday , April 7 , 2011
#Text=Image : Brazilian Government .
#Text=Twelve people died during a shooting at a school in the neighborhood Realengo in the Brazilian city of Rio de Janeiro .
#Text=The gunman is numbered among the dead , after taking his own life .
#Text=Ten people are reported injured during the attack by a man identified as Wellington Menezes Olivera , a 23 year old ex-student from the school .
#Text=The attack took place just after 8am local time ( 11:00 GMT ) this morning .
#Text=Television station TV Globo reported that Olivera entered the Tasso da Silveira municipal school , telling officials that he was attending to make a speech to students .
#Text=He was reportedly carrying at least two revolvers and a significant amount of ammunition .
#Text=Witnesses state that he began to fire at pupils ' heads , killing ten girls and one boy .
#Text=Rio state health secretary , Sergio Cortes , stated that those injured in the attack were taken to local hospitals .
#Text=At least four were said to be in a " grave " condition .
#Text=Rio 's Police chief , Martha Rocha , said in a press conference that the gunman had no previous criminal history .
#Text=She stated that he was carrying 2 firearms , although she did not specify what type .
#Text=During the attack he fired off at least 30 rounds of ammunition .

#Text=There were approximately 400 people in the school when the attack began , and shortly after the shooting started , two small boys outside the school , one with a gunshot wound , ran almost two city blocks until they found police and alerted them to the incident .

#Text=One officer , Marcio Alves , stated that  He saw me and aimed a gun at me , I shot him in the legs , he fell down the stairs and then shot himself in the head . "

column1: #Text=Police report that Olivera was carrying a " long and rambling " letter , confirming his intentions to commit suicide .
#Text=In a statement by the Mayor of Rio , Eduardo Paes , he made it clear that life at the school had become a " hellish nightmare . "
#Text=Authorities closed the school temporarily while they investigate , but Mayor Paes confirmed that the school will reopen .
#Text=The fate of all the children in the school is not yet known .
#Text=One eleven year old pupil from the school , Wanderson Barbosa , was interviewed by Associated Press as he sat on the steps of his house .

#Text=He was in his classroom when the attack started , and he and others in his class thought that other students were fighting , until his teacher told them to get to the floor , because it was gunfire .
#Text=" I 'm so worried , " Barbosa said to reporters , " We do n't have news of everyone yet . "

#Text=Meanwhile , Rio 's Governor , Sergio Cabral , called the attacker a " psychopath " , whilst indicating that he does not believe anyone else was involved in the attack , but that investigations into the incident will continue .
